import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Flex, Stack, Text, Container, Box, Accordion, Radio, Group, Center, ColorInput, Slider, Input, Button, } from "@mantine/core"; import { Dropzone, IMAGE_MIME_TYPE } from "@mantine/dropzone"; import { IconCircleXFilled, IconPhoto, } from "@tabler/icons-react"; import classes from "../css/Dropzone.module.css"; const ImageTest = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState(1); const handleChange = (newValue) => { setValue(newValue); }; const handleIncrement = () => { const newValue = value + 1; if (newValue <= 100) { setValue(newValue); } }; return ( Image
Image Select Image Hight Width Alignment Boxfit Background Color Back Button Radious Top Left Padding Left Margin ); }; export default ImageTest;
